text:
="preserve">Laskovyi Mai (may be spelled also as "Laskovyy May", "Laskovy May", "Laskovy Mai", "Laskoviy May";) was a Soviet boy band from Moscow. It was founded by Russian songwriter, composer and musician Sergei Kuznetsov.
The group's best-known member was Yuri Shatunov. The groupd ended in 1992. Laskovyi Mai once had been called "the legends of the 80–90s".
